articles.title: Westpac Australia fined $40 million for charging dead clients - 1News
articles.description: The bank has been fined $113 million in total over a series of compliance failures.
articles.content:
Westpac has been fined $113 million over a series of compliance failures which included charging advice fees to more than 11,800 deceased customers.
